info.title: API Banking – Payee Management APIs
info.description:
**API Banking – Payee Management APIs**
Payee Management APIs enable you to digitise your regular beneficiaries/suppliers/vendors account details in the system and make direct e-payment to beneficiaries

tags.name: Payee Management
tags.description: Payee Management APIs enable you to digitise your regular beneficiaries/suppliers/vendors account details in the system and make direct e-payment to beneficiaries

post.description: The Create Bulk Payee API exposes the ability to create multiple payees in a single shot. Upon successful validation of required parameters it returns an acknowledgement as a representation that a payee request was received successfully. To check the status of a specific payee, you are required to use the Retrieve Payee Details API and/or subscribe to notifications via webhook, which provides the current status of the payee.

400.description: Invalid request. Missing or invalid data

example.errorMessage: header.batchCount does not match with the number of payees provided

429.description: Default return code for health status, indicating a warning

500.description: Internal server error. This indicates an error in the API server

503.description: System dependency is down or undergoing maintenance. Try again later

post.description: The Create Payee API exposes the ability to create a single payee. Upon successful validation of required parameters it returns an acknowledgement as a representation that a payee request was received successfully. To check the status of a specific payee, you are required to use the Retrieve Payee Details API and/or subscribe to notifications via webhook, which provides the current status of the payee.

400.description: Invalid request. Missing or invalid data

429.description: Default return code for health status, indicating a warning

500.description: Internal server error. This indicates an error in the API server

503.description: System dependency is down or undergoing maintenance. Try again later

post.description: The Delete Payee API exposes the ability to delete existing single payee. Upon successful validation of required parameters it returns an acknowledgement as a representation that a payee deletion request was received successfully. After deletion, this payee record will not be available for payment initiation. To check the status of a specific payee, you are required to use the Retrieve Payee Details API and/or subscribe to notifications via webhook, which provides the current status of the payee.

400.description: Invalid request. Missing or invalid data

429.description: Default return code for health status, indicating a warning

500.description: Internal server error. This indicates an error in the API server

503.description: System dependency is down or undergoing maintenance. Try again later

get.description: The Retrieve Payee Details API provides you the ability to query a payee details based on a given payee nickname. As a response it will return a list of active and inactive payees along with its statuses

parameters.name: payeeNickName
parameters.description: Payee ID which is used to retrieve payee details

parameters.name: messageId
parameters.description: Unique Identifier for the transaction. This should be a unique tracking value (GUID) to identify the request, it is used for audit & support

400.description: Invalid request. Missing or invalid data

429.description: Default return code for health status, indicating a warning

500.description: Internal server error. This indicates an error in the API server

503.description: System dependency is down or undergoing maintenance. Try again later

get.description: The Retrieve Payee Details List API allows you to retrieve a full list of created payees which you are authorised to access based on authentication process. As a response it will return a paginated list of active and inactive payees along with its statuses

parameters.name: messageId
parameters.description: Unique Identifier for the transaction. This should be a unique tracking value (GUID) to identify the request, it is used for audit & support

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number of payee details response.Defaulted to 1

parameters.name: payeeStatus
parameters.description: Status of the payee. Defaulted to ALL

parameters.name: countryCode
parameters.description: Country of the payee.Defaulted to ALL

400.description: Invalid request. Missing or invalid data

429.description: Default return code for health status, indicating a warning

500.description: Internal server error. This indicates an error in the API server

503.description: System dependency is down or undergoing maintenance. Try again later

post.description: The Update Payee API exposes the ability to update a single payee. Upon successful validation of required parameters it returns an acknowledgement as a representation that a payee update request was received successfully. To check the status of a specific payee, you are required to use the Retrieve Payee Details API and/or subscribe to notifications via webhook, which provides the current status of the payee.

400.description: Invalid request. Missing or invalid data

429.description: Default return code for health status, indicating a warning

500.description: Internal server error. This indicates an error in the API server

503.description: System dependency is down or undergoing maintenance. Try again later

messageId.description: Unique identifier for the operation. This should be a unique tracking value (GUID) to identify the request, it is used for audit & support

batchId.description: Unique identifier for a batch of bulk payees

batchCount.description: Number of payees to be created

OpenApiBulkPayeeHeader.description: Header details in client's request body

payees.description: List of payees, and bank details in client's request body

phoneNumber.description: Contact phone number with country dial code

mobileNumber.description: Contact mobile number with country dial code

faxNumber.description: Contact fax number with country dial code

clearingSystemId.description: Local clearing bank code, for example IFSC Code for India

type.description: Financial Institution type, SW for SWIFT Payment and LC for local payment

BIC.description: Financial Institution, BIC code of branch

id.description:
Identification Number. Validations for id
Value Validation Example
Aadhaar ID length 12 and only numeric 123456789123
MMID max length 7 1234567
MMID MobileNum max length 10 1234567890
MWP Enter mobilewallet provider name IMTIN,IMTINPAY
MWP MobileNum Enter mobile number with valid pattern 1234567890/1234
MOBILENO Country specific validation & only numeric, max length 10 for IN, max length 8 for SG 1234567890 for IN
VPA maxLength 34 abc@okscb
NRIC maxLength 9 S1234567G
UEN max length 13

identityType.description:
Identification Type.
CountryAccepted values
INAadhaar ID, MMID, MMID MobileNum, MWP, MWP MobileNum, VPA
SGUEN, NRIC, MOBILENO

OpenApiIdentity.description: Additional payment methods details subject to payee's country

country.description: Country of the intermediary payee agent

type.description: Financial Institution type, SW for SWIFT Payment and LC for local payment

BIC.description: Financial Institution, BIC code of branch

nickName.description: Unique Client Reference ID for the payee

identity.description: Additional payment methods details subject to payee's country

jointPayeeIdentityType.description: Identity type of the secondary Beneficiary

OpenApiPayee.description: Payee and bank details in client's request body

mwp.description: Set to 'Y' if mobile wallet payment present otherwise 'N'

messageId.description: Unique identifier for the transaction. This should be a unique tracking value (GUID) to identify the request, it is used for audit & support

OpenApiPayeeHeader.description: Header details in client's request body

payeeNickName.description: Nickname of the payee to be deleted

nickName.description: Unique client reference ID for the payee

identity.description: Additional payment methods details for a payee

OpenApiPayeeRes.description: List of payees and their details present with the bank

payees.description: List of payees and their details present with the bank
